name: Balloon Shooter (OneEgg42)
description:
In Balloon Shooter you have to pop the balloons of the enemies to kill them but you also have to protect you own balloon or else you will plummet to you death. 

Sorry Mac and Linux users, i can only export to windows for right now

Also sorry if you find any bugs, I was rushing a bit!

If I had more time i would like to have added health bars to the enemies and player 

Controls:

WASD to move

Aim with the mouse
